辩论全程，油管视频

辩论原话：Joe Biden criticized President Trump for touting U.S. relations with North Korea under his watch. "That’s like saying we had a good relationship with Hitler before he invaded Europe," Biden said.

还有问题里说的“林肯”，原文是：
Trump: Nobody has done more for the black community than Donald Trump, with the exception of Abraham Lincoln, POSSIBLE exception of Abraham Lincoln. （1:31:35)

Biden: "Abraham Lincoln" here is one of the most racist president's we've had in modern history. He pours fuel on every single racist fire, every single one. (1:38:24)

Trump: You made a reference that (of) Abraham Lincoln, where did that came in? (1:39:05)

Biden: You said you are Abraham Lincoln.

Trump: No, no…… （以下从略）

在美国这边感觉确实有些华人（也包括留学生），稍微有点难度的英文就经常理解错，并且完全意识不到自己的理解有问题。

当然我不是说支持川普就是脑子浆糊。我本人在6个月以前还是相对更支持川普的。
